text: Volk is a German term for a people or an ethnic group. Volk or Volks may also refer to: *6189 Völk, a main belt asteroid *Volk (surname), people with the name *Volk (album), a 2006 album by Laibach *Volks, a Japanese doll-making company *Volk Racing, a flagship brand of forged alloy wheel by Rays Engineering *Volks, an informal term for a Volkswagen car ==See also== *
title: Volk (disambiguation)
